title: PhpWebStudy software services on/off
text1: 1. Take PHP as an example, you can click the switch button on the left side of the PHP menu to turn on/off the service.
text2: 2. You can also click the service button of PHP module, in the opened page, click the corresponding button to turn on/off/restart the service, etc.
text3: 3. You can also click the switch button at the top of the left menu to turn on/off all software with one click
